Cyprus offers measures to support estranged Turk CypriotsCyprus announced a series of gestures to support estranged Turkish Cypriots on Friday, days before the visit of a United Nations envoy who will assess prospects for the resumption of long-stalled peace talks. Sat, 27 Jan 2024 00:34:52 GMT YUEYS7C63VMAZL77VUFYKI7COE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/cyprus-offers-measures-support-estranged-turk-cypriots-2024-01-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Moldova separatist negotiator won't meet in government-held areas, citing arrest fearThe chief negotiator for Moldova's Russian-backed separatist Transdniestria region said on Friday that his team would no longer attend talks on the country's future in areas under government control because he feared arrest. Sat, 27 Jan 2024 00:31:16 GMT TDZ5XHDUQJKITDBX4SKYW6BS6Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldova-separatist-negotiator-wont-meet-government-held-areas-citing-arrest-fear-2024-01-27/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
Tuvalu's pro-Taiwan leader loses seat in national electionThe pro-Taiwan leader of the Pacific islands nation of Tuvalu, Kausea Natano, lost his seat in an election closely watched by Taiwan, China and the U.S., partial results showed on Saturday. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 23:58:23 GMT KF4RR4LQRRNDBFAAF4RB5VBHXE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/tuvalus-pro-taiwan-leader-loses-seat-national-election-2024-01-26/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
Lebanon's parliament passes 2024 budget, shunning major reformsLebanon's parliament late on Friday passed an amended budget for 2024 that experts said neglected to include crucial reforms that would help the country emerge from a financial meltdown gutting the public sector for nearly five years. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 23:33:44 GMT KEWILDKJ4ZOQTI3Z2RXVOXLPZI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/lebanons-parliament-passes-2024-budget-shunning-major-reforms-2024-01-26/Reuters世界中东
Ukraine's Zelenskiy announces second pro-business body after fury over banker's arrestUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy announced on Friday the creation of a second body to assist businesses in wartime after several entrepreneurs voiced outrage at the arrest of a prominent banker. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 23:06:37 GMT XUTVJ6W6LFJ47H2BNXITNEHGHA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-announces-second-pro-business-body-after-fury-over-bankers-2024-01-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Germany's Scholz says dark neo-Nazi networks are on the riseGermany's Chancellor Olaf Scholz on Saturday voiced concern over the rise of extreme-right tendencies in his country 79 years after the Auschwitz extermination camp was liberated. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 23:03:39 GMT 3H5YMKYZDBJVVPKKW4RPH2GZ44 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/germanys-scholz-says-dark-neo-nazi-networks-are-rise-2024-01-26/Reuters世界欧洲
North Korea, China agree to defend common interests as senior envoys meetNorth Korea and China agreed to strengthen tactical cooperation and defend common interests, the North's official KCNA news agency said on Saturday, reporting on Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui's meeting with Chinese Vice Foreign Minister Sun Weidong. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 21:50:43 GMT K7Q6FLOZCNIZLOQQIJM7NVFCPI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-china-agree-defend-common-interests-senior-envoys-meet-2024-01-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
Canadian cardinal temporarily steps down after lawsuit alleging abuseCardinal Gerald Lacroix, one of the top Roman Catholic clergymen in Canada, on Friday stepped down temporarily after he was named in a class-action lawsuit against the church that alleged sexual assault. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 21:49:19 GMT UT3H6EGCQBN3DOGIPEMI6MKZ6Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canadian-cardinal-temporarily-steps-down-after-lawsuit-alleging-abuse-2024-01-26/Reuters世界美洲
Venezuela court upholds ban on leading opposition presidential candidate MachadoVenezuela's Supreme Justice Tribunal on Friday upheld a ban which prevents presidential candidate Maria Corina Machado from holding office, upending the opposition's plans for elections planned later this year. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 21:18:19 GMT RDYKKHYOJNN2JHCQE5EUOCMYSI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/venezuela-arrests-allies-opposition-candidate-conspiracy-accusations-2024-01-26/Vivian Sequera, Mayela Armas, Deisy Buitrago世界美洲
Argentina's President Milei to visit Israel in display of supportArgentina's President Javier Milei said on Friday he would travel to Israel in the "coming weeks," one of his first overseas trips since the libertarian economist took office last month after pledging strong support for Israel during his campaign. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 18:52:40 GMT EEBVEJNU3ZMETLI3LTQABIWAII https://www.reuters.com/world/argentinas-president-milei-visit-israel-display-support-2024-01-26/Candelaria Grimberg世界
Ecuador top court blocks nine questions for referendumEcuador's top court has blocked nine questions that President Daniel Noboa wanted to put to Ecuadoreans in a referendum on security issues, arguing they failed to meet constitutional requirements, it said on Friday. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 18:49:50 GMT UY7KNXCHNVMYDMNJS3NNLLWHDU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ecuador-top-court-blocks-nine-questions-referendum-2024-01-26/Alexandra Valencia世界美洲
